alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 11:02PM EDT until June 15 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT FOR HARRISON...WESTERN JEFFERSON AND SOUTHEASTERN TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES... At 1100 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Carrollton to 7 miles east of Dennison to 6 miles north of Freeport to 7 miles southwest of Uhrichsville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Uhrichsville, Cadiz, Freeport, Dennison, Scio, Jewett, Bowerston, Holloway, Gilmore, Tippecanoe, Piedmont, and Stillwater. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
